# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="0326b-102">Chyba 550/553 v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0326b-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0326b-103">Keď ste ďaleko od domova a pošlite e-mail z pripojeného účtu pomocou Outlook.com, vaša e-mailová správa môže byť vrátená s 550, 553 alebo Relay-zakázané chybové hlásenie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0326b-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0326b-104">Skontrolujte [nastavenia synchronizácie e-mailov](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) v **nastaveniach**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0326b-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0326b-105">> **Zobraziť všetky nastavenia** > programu Outlook**mail** > **Sync e-mail**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0326b-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0326b-106">Uistite sa, že Predvolená adresa je rovnaká ako názov vašej e-mailovej domény.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0326b-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="0326b-107">Ak máte v cene vlastnú e-mailovú doménu, zmeňte ju na adresu outlook.com, live.com alebo hotmail.com.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0326b-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
